content.question: The authorâ€™s argument regarding taxation most closely resembles the arguments made by

choices.label: Enlightenment thinkers regarding natural rights and the social contract
working-class movements regarding better wages and working conditions

content.answer: Enlightenment thinkers regarding natural rights and the social contract

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
